price: [It will be said to them], “O My slaves, there is no fear for you Today, nor will you grieve,
arabic: يَٰعِبَادِ لَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ وَلَآ أَنتُمۡ تَحۡزَنُونَ
